programme.title: Whitewater
programme.short_synopsis: An overview of the Clintons' involvement in the Whitewater scandal unfolding in 1994.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Whitewater investigation, the reaction to Hilary Clinton's controversial financial dealings and the workings of the commodities market are explained by Alistair Cooke.
